about_me.title: Know about me
about_me.description: Frontend Developer specializing in building scalable web and mobile applications, including CRM systems and Admin Panels. Experienced with React.js and React Native, creating responsive, high-performance interfaces with a strong focus on usability, security, and clean architecture. Skilled in transforming complex business requirements into intuitive digital solutions.
